/#homeHeroBlue About ARC Investments ARC Investments is a private, professional property management company specializing in the operation of manufactured home communities and self storage facilities . With over forty years of experience, ARC has a proven track record of Commitment and Expertise. We achieve high quality results that benefit community residents and owners alike. Family owned and operated from the start, ARC's management approach is straight-forward and honest. We set high standards for our personnel and our properties. Our professional staff strives for a long and positive relationship with every resident. We want the communities we operate to be places that homeowners are proud to call "home." ARC's business philosophy recognizes the symbiotic relationship between community residents and the community owner. We seek to maximize value to both through proactive, hands-on management focused on maintenance and improvement of the many facets of community quality. The standards we set for our company over thirty years ago are still very much a part of our philosophy today: competent, friendly personnel, and quality communities that reflect the values of our residents and our company. Welcome to The Mark! /#ovSi
About
Quality Lifestyle in a Picturesque Setting…
Join us in our neighborhood; feel right at home among friendly folks,  good neighbors, and fun activities.  Nestled in a peaceful corner of  North East St. Petersburg, Gateway is an ideally located community with  almost 40 acres of well-maintained home sites and facilities.  Our  continually updated and modern park reflects a warm, stable atmosphere  that will provide you the that "welcome home" feeling.
